timeline.bodyText: Why no to return Stream<?> in such methods? (just because we already have it and most times caller needs to make only one iteration over objects in response... so converting it into List is resource wasting)
timeline.author: surabujin

replies.bodyText:
It's a good point. When the initial implementation of the persistence layer was introduced, we inherited the Neo4j-OGM approach - fetching via collections.
However, I don't think this task is a right time to refactor the api.
replies.author: sergii-iakovenko
